about_the_game:
[img][/img]

[b]GGO[/b] is a heady, real-time gunfighting versus game that breaks down geographical restrictions and allows you to compete with players from all over the globe. In intense battles, you can show off your shooting skills and enjoy immersive combat fun.

[h2]Get Rewarded[/h2]

In the course of the game, you can not only experience intense and exciting battles, but also have the opportunity to obtain generous rewards. Gold and B Coins can be used to unlock all kinds of powerful weapons and cool skins to make your character unique on the battlefield.

[h2]Tournaments[/h2]

What's even more exciting is that the game also organizes regular competitions, in which you have the chance to win up to 1 million grand prizes, which is not only a challenge to your personal strength, but also an excellent opportunity to move towards glory and wealth.

Call up your buddies, join the battlefield of M, fight side by side, and write your own gun battle legend together!
detailed_description:
[img][/img]

[b]GGO[/b] is a heady, real-time gunfighting versus game that breaks down geographical restrictions and allows you to compete with players from all over the globe. In intense battles, you can show off your shooting skills and enjoy immersive combat fun.

[h2]Get Rewarded[/h2]

In the course of the game, you can not only experience intense and exciting battles, but also have the opportunity to obtain generous rewards. Gold and B Coins can be used to unlock all kinds of powerful weapons and cool skins to make your character unique on the battlefield.

[h2]Tournaments[/h2]

What's even more exciting is that the game also organizes regular competitions, in which you have the chance to win up to 1 million grand prizes, which is not only a challenge to your personal strength, but also an excellent opportunity to move towards glory and wealth.

Call up your buddies, join the battlefield of M, fight side by side, and write your own gun battle legend together!
legal_notice: To summarize, online games have been incorporated into the regulatory scope of our laws and regulations in terms of virtual property protection, prohibition of gambling and protection of consumer rights and interests. Players and game operators should abide by the relevant laws and regulations, and jointly create a healthy and fair online game environment. The personal rights, property rights and other legitimate rights and interests of civil subjects are protected by law and shall not be infringed by any organization or individual. The property rights of civil subjects are equally protected by law. Anyone who gathers a crowd to gamble or makes gambling a business for the purpose of profit shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not more than three years, detention or control, and shall be fined.
name: GGO 枪战火线

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-10300 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-1300K / AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 16384 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 3060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT / INTEL Arc A750
  • Storage: 100000 MB available space

short_description: GGO是一款令人热血沸腾的即时枪战对战游戏，它打破了地域限制，让你能够与来自全球各地的玩家同场竞技。在激烈的对战中，你可以尽情施展自己的射击技巧，享受沉浸式的战斗乐趣。 在游戏过程中，你不仅能体验紧张刺激的对战，还有机会获得丰厚的奖励。金币和 B 币可用于解锁各类强力武器、炫酷皮肤，让你的角色在战场上独树一帜。 更令人心动的是，游戏还会定期举办比赛，参与其中就有机会赢取高达 100 万大奖的活动，这不仅是对个人实力的挑战，更是迈向荣耀与财富的绝佳机会。
